Class PlanetWars

java.lang.Object
  PlanetWars

public class PlanetWars
extends java.lang.Object

Class representing the current game state. Contains complete information about planets, fleets and forces. Does not contain any information not taken from bots input (turns etc.) Contains methods for parsing input Strings and getting meta-information. Setters and getters omitted for a more dynamic development speed.

Calculates which of your planets are the closest to the target.

Parameters:
px - the target planet to which distance is measured
Returns:
list of planets sorted by rising distance to px

Distance

public int Distance(int sourcePlanet,
                    int destinationPlanet)
Returns the distance between two planets, rounded up to the next highest integer. This is the number of discrete time steps it takes to get between the two planets.

Distance

public static int Distance(Planet source,
                           Planet destination)
Returns the distance between two planets, rounded up to the next highest integer. This is the number of discrete time steps it takes to get between the two planets.

IssueOrder

public void IssueOrder(int sourcePlanet,
                       int destinationPlanet,
                       int numShips)
Sends an order to the game engine. An order is composed of a source planet number, a destination planet number, and a number of ships. Actually calls the other overloaded version of the method.

Parameters:
sourcePlanet - the index number of your planet that sends the ships
destinationPlanet - the index number of the targetted planet
numShips - the number of ships to be sent

IssueOrder

public void IssueOrder(Planet source,
                       Planet dest,
                       int numShips)
Sends an order to the game engine. Performs full validation of the eligibility of the order to prevent accidental illegal moves due to bug. Checks the following: - you must own the source planet. - you can't move more ships than are currently on the source planet.

Parameters:
source - the Planet that sends the ships
dest - the Planet targetted by the order
numShips - the number of ships to be sent

FinishTurn

public void FinishTurn()
Sends the game engine a message to let it know that we're done sending orders. This signifies the end of our turn.

IsAlive

public boolean IsAlive(int playerID)
Returns true if the named player owns at least one planet or fleet. Otherwise, the player is deemed to be dead and false is returned.

Winner

public int Winner()
If the game is not yet over (ie: at least two players have planets or fleets remaining), return -1. If the game is over (ie: only one player is left) then that player's number is returned. If there are no remaining players, then the game is a draw and 0 is returned.
